arts.sum: Napoli solidified their position at the top of the Serie A table with a convincing 2-0 victory over Verona, thanks to a fortunate deflection from Giovanni Di Lorenzo and a stunning long-range strike from Andre Frank Zambo Anguissa. Napoli have officially announced the acquisition of Danish midfielder Philip Anyanwu Billing from Bournemouth on a loan deal that includes an option to buy. This transfer comes after Napoli's recent decision to loan out Folorunsho to Fiorentina under a similar arrangement. The post OFFICIAL: Napoli Sign Philip Billing appeared first on FootItalia.com.
